questions.prompt: What is the primary advantage of deep learning over traditional machine learning?
options: Automatic hierarchical feature learning from raw data
questions.correctAnswer: Automatic hierarchical feature learning from raw data
questions.explanation: Deep learning automatically discovers hierarchical representations, eliminating manual feature engineering required by traditional ML methods.

questions.prompt: Which clustering algorithm can discover arbitrary cluster shapes?
questions.explanation: DBSCAN uses density-based clustering and can discover clusters of arbitrary shapes, unlike k-means which assumes spherical clusters.
